about_the_game:
A new and exclusive collection of 4 in-game music tracks to enhance Flatspace IIk. Like any in-game music for Flatspace, these will trigger at random when you enter a new sector.

This pack contains special Flatspace edits of four tracks from the 2023 album The Golden Age by Mark Sheeky.

The pack includes a full description of the music as a pdf booklet. Here is an outline of the music included:

Welcome To My Gallery
A rip-roaring chase down the a musical, and artistic, wormhole. This track also opens the Golden Age album.

Nature Morte
Nature Morte is the French term for a still life painting. A gentle track, played live in one take on a Yamaha MODX synthesizer.

Cotán
Juan Sánchez Cotán was a painter of gentle, almost hypnotically sacred, paintings. This track attempts to evoke his monastic mood.

Tycho Brahe The Noseless Astronomer
In a break from the painter theme, this song is about Danish astronomer Tycho Brahe. This Flatspace edit has something of a bold alien march about it.

name: Flatspace IIk Golden Age Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11.
  • Processor: Any Windows compatible CPU.
  • Graphics: Basic DirectX compatible 3D card required.
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: This is a music pack, so sound is needed.

short_description: An exclusive collection of 4 in-game music tracks to enhance Flatspace IIk. This pack contains special Flatspace edits of four tracks from the album The Golden Age by Mark Sheeky.
